notes: If both port and starboard ailerons inoperable, landing roll -1

9.description: Roll 1D for engine hit, then roll 1D again for damage type

damage_roll.1-2: Fire - roll to extinguish on Table BL-3
damage_roll.3-4: Leakage - B-17 may travel limited zones

12.description: Roll 1D: 1-3 = Brakes out, landing roll -1; 4-6 = Landing gear inoperable, landing roll -3

sub_roll.1-3: Brakes out - landing roll on Table G-9 -1
sub_roll.4-6: Landing gear inoperable - landing roll on Table G-9 -3

wing_root_hits.description: Track wing root hits per wing separately
wing_root_hits.consequence: Wing rips off, immediate bailout on Table G-7

notes: Wing root hits are tracked cumulatively per wing - 5 hits causes wing to rip off
Engine damage varies based on which wing (port=#1,#2; starboard=#3,#4)
Fuel tank damage can cause fires, leakage, or self-seal with no effect
Landing gear damage affects landing difficulty
